thread.title: Chris Mintz, Oregon school shooting hero, finally speaks about tragedy
thread.title_full: Chris Mintz, Oregon school shooting hero, finally speaks about tragedy - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Chris Mintz, Oregon school shooting hero, finally speaks about tragedy
text: When Chris Harper Mercer walked onto the campus of Umpqua Community College in Roseburg, Oregon earlier this month, his classmates and teachers had no idea of the horror that was about to unfold. Once the massacre was over, nine people were left dead, but that number could have been higher if it wasn't for one student and former military veteran. youtube.com
